title: Faye Evarts & Alexis Haines Get Real About Giving Birth, Postpartum Depression & Anxiety, & C-sections
itunes:title: Faye Evarts & Alexis Haines Get Real About Giving Birth, Postpartum Depression & Anxiety, & C-sections
description:
#234: Lauryn and her little sister, Faye Evarts, sit for a roundtable with Recovering From Reality’s Alexis Haines. Faye and Alexis are both moms so they give Lauryn the real deal on what’s going to happen during and after labor. They talk postpartum depression, anxiety, mom truths, what happens to the vagina, c-sections, the works. Get ready for a wild ride!

To connect with Faye Evarts click HERE

To connect with Alexis Haines click HERE

To read Alexis's new book click HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE
